Actions.Name: Maddening Stinging
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range with pheromones that attract stinging and biting insects. While marked, after using any ability on their turn, the [name] may shove the marked foe 1 in any direction. An adjacent ally, but not the marked character, can deal 4 piercing damage to and use the interact ability on the marked character to dislodge the insects, ending this mark.
